tool_description: Want to know what's special on the specific date, send a request here and get details of all selective, events, births, holidays, and even deaths.
name: Day Special Finder API
title: Day Special Finder API

api_list.name: Find all specials on the day
api_list.description: It will find all births, holidays, events, selected, and deaths on the day.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://day-special-finder-api.p.rapidapi.com/all/03/30"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "day-special-finder-api.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://day-special-finder-api.p.rapidapi.com/all/{mm}/{dd}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "day-special-finder-api.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Find Special on the day based on types
api_list.description: Find the speciality of the day based on types like holiday, selected, events, births, and deaths.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://day-special-finder-api.p.rapidapi.com/Events/03/30"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "day-special-finder-api.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://day-special-finder-api.p.rapidapi.com/{type}/{mm}/{dd}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "day-special-finder-api.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
